<@U04J43P4Q8L>
My goal was to use one form and set different values for a hidden field.
Basically:
```which_department=dept_a
which_department=dept_b```
I ended up using two identical forms.  :shrug:
Which script are you hoping to defer? How has that script been added to the page you're working on?
Would love to see your solve, mariana
